thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com
thread.title: Christina Johnson

author: Christina Johnson
title: Christina Johnson
text: Honestly, my credit was in the dumps but I needed a vehicle ASAP. I'd been researching companies online in an effort to find an establishment that would be willing to take a chance on me. I came across Drive Time and I'm so glad I did. My "Salesman Extraordinaire" was James Walker. James was professional, friendly, and upfront about all of the optional products provided by DT- products I opted for by the way. It was a great experience and I look forward to the next few years with them.
